# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

A function that hashes the essential components of the value by passing them into the hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to use when combining the components.

## Comparing and hashing ad impressions

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.
